Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (int ind = 1; ind < numbers.Length; ind++) {  	long difference = Math.Abs (numbers [ind] - numbers [ind - 1]);  	if (difference % 2 == 0) {  		sum += difference;  		++ind;  	}  }
